subSections.text: * {{l|mul|[[乘]]}} ''(Preferred form in modern Chinese, {{w|Kyūjitai}} form of ''<big>乗</big>)

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: Variant form of {{l|zh|乘}} written in {{w|clerical script}} found in the <big>《魯峻碑陰》</big> stone tablet of the {{w|Han dynasty#Eastern Han|eastern Han}} period.
